meanings.definition: relating to or used for killing insects
meanings.sent1: The insecticidal spray effectively eliminates pests in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use insecticidal chemicals to protect their crops from bugs.
meanings.sent3: The ants threw a tiny insecticidal party to celebrate being bug-free.
meanings.sent4: Her swift actions were like an insecticidal strike against the invading mosquitoes.
meanings.sent5: The insecticidal powder worked like magic, making the insects disappear instantly.

meanings.definition: having the properties of an insecticide
meanings.sent1: The insecticidal soap is gentle on plants but tough on pests.
meanings.sent2: The new insecticidal formula is safe for pets and children.
meanings.sent3: The insecticidal shampoo left the dog smelling fresh and bug-free.
meanings.sent4: His words had an insecticidal effect, silencing the buzzing gossip around town.
meanings.sent5: The insecticidal scent of the flowers repelled any unwanted visitors from the garden.
